name: Condition Red
description:
Escape a space station overrun with hostile aliens. All alone you have to use your wits to outsmart the enemy to stay one step ahead and stay alive.

Condition Red features side scrolling adrenaline pumping action with puzzle solving and platforming over 3 action packed single player levels. Seven more levels will be added during early access at no additional cost.

The first game by Sri Lankan developer Nervtek, Condition Red is a 3D sci-fi side-scroller featuring old school and 2.5D gameplay mechanics.
